Plot_data module

class Plot_data.CSVDataPlotter(csv_file_path)[source]

Bases: object

A class to plot data from CSV files using various types of plots including candlestick, 2D line, bar, scatter, 3D scatter, and 4D scatter plots.

plot_candle(fields, pl_lines)[source]

Plots a candlestick chart for grouped state data from the CSV file.

Parameters: - fields (list): The fields to group the data by. - pl_lines (list): The lines to plot.

plot_csv_data_2d(fields, pl_lines, typeP='line')[source]

Plots 2D data from the CSV file as line, bar, or scatter plots.

Parameters:

  • fields (list) – The fields to plot.

  • pl_lines (list) – The lines to plot.

  • typeP (str) – The type of plot (‘line’, ‘bar’, or ‘scatter’).

plot_csv_data_3d(fields, time_metrics)[source]

Plots 3D data from the CSV file.

Parameters:

  • fields (list) – The fields to plot on the x and y axes.

  • time_metrics (list) – The metrics to plot on the z-axis.

plot_csv_data_4d(fields)[source]

Plots 4D data from the CSV file using color mapping for the fourth dimension.

Parameters: - fields (list): The fields to plot on the x, y, and z axes.

Plot_data.comma_separated_strings(string)[source]

Splits a string into a list using commas as separators.

Parameters:

string – The input string to split (str).

Returns:

A list of strings obtained by splitting the input string. (list)
